Package com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms

Class DBEngine

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.db.rdbms.DBEngine
public class DBEngine extends Object
A database engine represent a back-end RDBMS system to which we connect through a JDBC driver.
Author:
Miquel Sas

    • toStringSQL

      public String toStringSQL(Value value)
      Convert the argument value to a string that can be used in a SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE or WHERE query. Note that type BINARY issues an error.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to format as a string.
      Returns:
      The formatted string.
